t: r/amazonprime on Reddit: Amazon asking for photos with handwritten note of damaged product

s: Curious to know if Amazon tracks habitual buyers who return items · We actually are starting to take detailed pictures of our collectibles because we have had several returns of our products that were clearly switched out for the same item the buyer already had in poor condition.

If you need to return or replace an item, visit Your Orders and select 'Return or Replace Items' on the relevant order. You can find help topics on this page such as how to replace broken and missing items, returning your order, and how to resolve refund issues.

t: Get Product Support - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you need help with using your product or if it doesn't work correctly, Amazon provides free Product Support. Among these options are calls, chat, manufacturer contact details, and text or video troubleshooting guides.

t: Damaged Amazon Fresh Items for Refund - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to return your Amazon Fresh product If you receive a damaged or unusable Amazon Fresh grocery item. You can request a refund through the Online Returns center up to 30 day from the date of delivery.

t: How to provide photos as a proof of damage?
s: Hello, The customer requested a return of an item with return reason: “Item defective or doesn’t work” with the comment: “The Nike tick has started to peel off”. I accepted the return the same day. The item was returned damaged with sings of excessive using.

t: r/UnethicalLifeProTips on Reddit: ULPT if your broken/not working item is still available on Amazon or in a big box store, buy it, replace your item and put the broken one (cleaned up) in the box and return it.
Damaged or Defective Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: All our products go through intense quality check before they are shipped. However, in rare instances a product may get damaged during transit. Read below for Frequently Asked Questions about damaged or defective products.

t: Return Items You Ordered - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can return many eligible items sold on Amazon.com. When you return an item, you may see different return options depending on the seller, item, or reason for return.
